name: Ice Nosfe
description:
Help the Van Helsing brothers defeat Nosfe in the lands of Transylvania. Use the freeze rifle to defeat the bosses in each dungeon. NES or Commodore style platform game inspired by classics like Tumblepop, Snow Bros, Bubble Bobble... Enjoy an 80's and 90's arcade with a partner.
Chiptune.
Compatible with Xbox or analog controller.
One or two players.
Pixel.
10 stages.
5 bosses.
10 enemies with different behavior.
